sentences.en: He induced skin cancer in mice with soot extracts.
sentences.cn: 他用煤烟提取物诱发了小鼠皮肤癌.

sentences.en: His face was blackened - either by mud or soot.
sentences.cn: 满脸上乌黑,不知是泥还是煤烟.

sentences.en: In soot the atoms have no regular arrangement.
sentences.cn: 在煤烟中,碳原子呈无规则排列.

sentences.en: Soot is the product of the imperfect combustion of fuel.
sentences.cn: 煤烟是燃料不完全燃烧的产物.

sentences.en: Soot is usually the product of the imperfect combustion of fuel.
sentences.cn: 煤烟通常是燃料不完全燃烧的产物.

sentences.en: Soot makes smoke dark and blackens walls.
sentences.cn: 烟灰使得烟成黑色,并熏黑了墙壁.

sentences.en: The air was loaded with soot.
The chimney is almost chocked up with soot.
sentences.cn: 烟囱几乎被烟灰堵住了.

sentences.en: The chimney was choked with soot.
The inside of a chimney soon gets covered in soot.
sentences.cn: 烟囱里面很快就覆盖了一层煤烟.

sentences.en: The parks and squares looked grim under a mantle of soot and ash.
sentences.cn: 在一层烟尘的笼罩之下，公园和广场显得阴沉沉的。

sentences.en: Their faces were blackened with soot.
There are dots of soot on the windowsill.
You'vegot a smudge of soot on your cheek.

words.tran_cn: 用煤灰覆盖；用煤烟弄脏

trans.tran_en: black powder that is produced when something is burned

trans.tran_cn: 用煤烟熏黑；以煤烟弄脏
